item.title: Fxxk SSH
item.description: 1 curl -O -L https://sourceforge.net/projects/sshpass/files/sshpass/1.06/sshpass-1.06.tar.gz && tar xvzf sshpass-1.06.tar.gz 2 ./configure 3 make install

item.title: Linux Path Description
item.description: The base of the Linux/Unix file system hierarchy begins at the root and everything starts with the root directory. These are the common top-level directories associated with the root directory: /bin – binary or executable programs. /etc – system configuration files. /home – home directory. It is the default current directory. /opt – optional or third-party software. /tmp – temporary space, typically cleared on reboot. /usr – User related programs. /var – log files.
